home.title: Group Home
home.op_unsubscribe_confirm_msg: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe this group? You won't receive any message from this group.

pay.title: Pay to Join
pay.welcome_desc: According to the requirements, please pay to join the group.

prepare_packet.title: Prepare Lucky Coin
prepare_packet.welcome: Share your luck with the group
prepare_packet.memo_too_long_err: Error: Too many charactors in greeting.

packet.paid: The lucky coin has sent to your wallet
packet.completed: The lucky coin has beed completed, if there are any remains will be return to the sender.

pay_wxqr.title: WeChat Payment
pay_wxqr.hint_desc: Take a screenshot, and scan it in WeChat Scan.
pay_wxqr.help_line_1: Step 1: Take a screenshot, it will be saved in your album.
pay_wxqr.help_line_3: Step 3: Tap the "+" button at top right, choose "Scan".
pay_wxqr.help_line_4: Step 4: Tap the "Album" at top right, choose the screenshot.

wxpay.title: WeChat Payment
wxpay.welcome_desc: According to the requirements, please pay to join the group.

wxpay_done.title: Payment Placed
wxpay_done.hint:
Your order has been placed.
It may take less than 3 min to handle your payment.
Please return to Mixin Messenger and join the group later.

coupons.title: Coupons
coupons.add_model_desc: Tap 'Create' to create 50 available coupon codes

invitation.rule1: * Pending: code is used but unverified
invitation.rule2: * You can apply new invitation codes after all existed codes had been used and verified
invitation.reject_reason: {amount} USDT valued BOX required before next request. If you meet the requirement, please wait for 1 hour and make sure all BOX Tokens are in Mixin Messenger Wallet.

notice.title: NOTICE:
notice.line2_1: You need an invitation code to join the group.
notice.line2_2: You need an invitation code and pay {amount} {symbol} to join the group.

rewards.title: Rewards
rewards.dialog_confrim_desc: Have you paid to send rewards to {name}?
